Other study characteristics.Patients characteristics: e.g. "patients with diagnosed AAA"; "patients with and without TAA"; "healthy subjects"
Other study characteristics.Dataset Size: Extract total size, including trainining, validation and test samples
Other study characteristics.Model Architecture or Device name: Extract NN architecture name, include SaMD Device name/version if available
Other study characteristics.Segmentation quality Dice: single number or multiple numbers if appropriate, include expert variability if available in the text
Other study characteristics.Segmentation quality Hausdorff: single number or multiple numbers if appropriate, include expert variability if available in the text
Other study characteristics.Diameters measurements quality: single number or multiple numbers if appropriate, include expert variability if available in the text
Other study characteristics.CT type: e.g. abdominal CT; low-dose CT; CT angiography; ECG-gated CT
